availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert J. Dyas (Presiding Judge Grant Co. Ct. | 30th KY)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, saddler and Presiding Judge. Petersburg, Kentucky, native. Married Mary Jane Henderson Dyas on October 27, 1837. Saddler in Grant County in 1860. Presiding Judge of the Grant County Court in 1863. Lieutenant and Captain in the 30th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from August 18, 1863 to April 11, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Grant County, Crittenden, p. 186. "Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954," database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:FW12-9YM : accessed 18 May 2017), Robert S. Dyas and Mary Jane Henderson, 27 Oct 1837; citing , Grant, Kentucky, United States, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond; FHL microfilm 266,220. Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 398.
